Denise Ho

Front-End Developer // Designer

About Myself

Hello, I am Denise from Taiwan. I am an enthusiastic software developer. I like coding as well as learning new technologies. Currently I am working as a front-end developer at a startup company in Taipei, Taiwan. I just got working holiday visa to Ireland, and I plan to go there around the end of June. I hope to join your team as a front-end developer. If you are interested in me, please contact me. Thank you very much.

Experience

National Taiwan Normal University

Bachelor's Degree - Major in Education / Minor in English

2005 - 2009

Tian Mu Junior High School

English Intern Teacher

During the internship, I learned basic web developing skills (html, css) from a teacher who made website for the school, and I found it really interesting. After the internship, I decieded to change my career path to become a programmer.

Aug 2009 - Feb 2010

Institute for Information Industry

Programming Training Courses Completed

In order to be prepared for being a programmer, I decided to take courses at Institute for Information Industry before seeking relevant job. Institute for Information Industry is the most prestigious information institute in Taiwan where provides great programming courses for beginners. I learned how to develop applications by coding in C# on ASP.NET platform, and managing my data by connecting to SQL database server. In the end of the course, I made a restaurant order system called "Big Stomache King" with three of my classmates as our final project.

Apr 2010 - Oct 2010

BankPro E-Service Technology

IT Assistant

Responsible for maintaining Accounts Payable System for Bank of Taiwan:
1. Testing the system and writing documentation.
2. Modifying C# codes and SQL selection statements.

Oct 2010 - May 2012

Fu Rong Magnet

Designer

Taking charge of designing magnetic products, exhibition decorations, and managing the Facebook fans page for the company.

Sep 2013 - Apr 2014

Denise Ho Illustration

Designer / Illustrator

I become a freelancer and make graphics and illustrations for some firms/restaurants. On the other side, I had joined a few illustration exhibitions and published an illustration children book online.
